title: The One with Ross's New Girlfriend
synopsis: Rachel waits at the airport for Ross, not knowing he is returning from China with his new girlfriend, Julie. Phoebe gives Monica an awful haircut.

title: The One with the Breast Milk
synopsis: The guys are uncomfortable with the thought of Carol's breast milk, while Rachel is upset by Monica's growing friendship with Julie.

title: The One Where Heckles Dies
synopsis: After Mr. Heckles dies and leaves all his belongings to Monica and Rachel, Chandler discovers he has eerie similarities with the late eccentric man.

title: The One with Phoebe's Husband
synopsis: Phoebe has married a gay Canadian ice dancer to help him get his green card.

title: The One with Five Steaks and an Eggplant
synopsis: Income issues divide the friends. Monica, Ross and Chandler have money; Phoebe, Rachel and Joey don't.

title: The One with the Baby on the Bus
synopsis: Chandler and Joey lose Ross's son while checking out women on a bus.

title: The One Where Ross Finds Out
synopsis: A drunken Rachel calls Ross and reveals her feelings for him on his answering machine. Now, Ross must make a decision between her and Julie.

title: The One with the List
synopsis: Joey and Chandler try to help Ross with his decision to date Julie or Rachel by making a list of the pros and cons of each.

title: The One with Phoebe's Dad
synopsis: In this Christmas episode, Phoebe tries to track down her real father.

title: The One with Russ
synopsis: Rachel is dating a guy named Russ, and is blind to his uncanny resemblance to Ross.

title: The One with the Lesbian Wedding
synopsis: Monica caters the wedding of Ross's ex-wife and her lesbian lover. Rachel learns that her mom and dad are getting a divorce.

title: The One After the Super Bowl: Part 1
synopsis: Ross travels to San Diego to visit Marcel, his monkey. Joey is stalked by a fan of his daytime drama. First of a two-part episode.

title: The One After the Super Bowl: Part 2
synopsis: Rachel and Monica compete for the affections of Jean-Claude Van Damme. Ross and Marcel go on a tour of the city. Second of a two-part episode.

title: The One with the Prom Video
synopsis: Monica and Rachel's prom video reveals Monica's former girth, Rachel's former nose and the way Ross has always felt about Rachel.

title: The One Where Ross and Rachel...You Know
synopsis: Ross and Rachel finally sleep together. Monica becomes infatuated with one of her parents' friends, for whom she caters a party.

title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
synopsis: After having a fight with Chandler, Joey moves out. Monica's father finds out that Monica is dating his best friend.

title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
synopsis: Joey considers moving back in with Chandler, but Chandler has a new roommate.

title: The One Where Dr. Ramoray Dies
synopsis: Joey's soap opera character gets dropped down an elevator shaft after Joey brags about writing his own lines.

title: The One Where Eddie Won't Go
synopsis: Chandler demands that his bizarre new roommate, Eddie, move out ... but Eddie won't go.

title: The One Where Old Yeller Dies
synopsis: Phoebe's world view is shattered when she learns how "Old Yeller" really ends.

title: The One with the Bullies
synopsis: Two bullies eject Chandler and Ross from Central Perk. Phoebe meets a brother she never knew she had.

title: The One with the Two Parties
synopsis: Complications ensue when Rachel's estranged parents show up at the surprise party that the gang planned for her.

title: The One with the Chicken Pox
synopsis: Phoebe catches chicken pox from the baby, just as her ex-boyfriend returns on shore leave from the Navy.

title: The One with Barry and Mindy's Wedding
synopsis: Rachel agrees to be the maid of honor at her ex-fianc√©'s wedding.
